DOC.brief_summary: AGN 201904, a proton pump inhibitor, versus esomeprazole in the prevention of stomach or upper intestinal damage following administration of high-dose aspirin in healthy volunteers
DOC.brief_title: AGN 201904 Versus Esomeprazole in the Prevention of Aspirin-induced Stomach or Upper Intestinal Damage in Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy Adult Volunteers who have provided written informed consent Volunteers with a history of upper gastrointestinal disease or who have a current diagnosis of upper gastrointestinal disease. Female volunteers who pregnant, nursing, or planning a pregnancy Volunteers with a history of drug or alcohol abuse
